price: 15. y hará que se desvanezca la ira de sus corazones. Y Al-lah acepta el arrepentimiento de quienes quiere. Al-lah es Omnisciente y Sabio.
arabic: وَيُذۡهِبۡ غَيۡظَ قُلُوبِهِمۡۗ وَيَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wayudh'hib ghayẓa qulūbihim wayatūbu al-lahu ʿalā man yashāu wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
